protein.general_function: Involved in ARF GTPase activator activity
protein.specific_function: GTPase-activating protein for ARF1 and, to a lesser extent, ARF5. Directly and specifically regulates the adapter protein 3 (AP-3)-dependent trafficking of proteins in the endosomal-lysosomal system

go_class.description: regulation of nucleobase, nucleoside, nucleotide and nucleic acid metabolic process
regulation of purine nucleotide catabolic process
